\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w rejected|strong="G1848"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w builders|strong="G3618"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w of|strong="G2776"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w corner|strong="G1137"\w*.
